name: 方旭偉
objective:
本課程將簡介醫學基礎與臨床知識，並對目前臨床使用之生醫材料作廣泛的介紹，與現今生物科技相結合，激發學生對於基礎研究及臨床科學的創意與思考。涵蓋科別將以牙科、骨科及整型外科為主。

Tho course will introduce the fundamental and clinical medicine, especially for biomaterials. The curriculum will focus on the biotechnology oriented innovation and thinking. Applications in dentistry, orthopaedics, and plastic surgery will be introduced.
schedule:
1-6 生醫材料商品化流程
7-12 法規與市場導向之考量
13-18 牙科、骨科及整型外科專題特論

Week 1-6 Commercialization process of Biomaterials
Week 7-12 Factors from regulatory and market
Week 13-18 Special topics for dentistry, orthopaedics, and plastic surgery
scorePolicy:
(1)　　期中＆期末報告 (60%) midterm& final exam
(2)　　平時成績 (40%) class performance
materials:
課堂筆記
Notes from the class
